document_notes.text:
This update for sudo fixes the following issues:

- L3: Tenable Scan reports sudo is vulnerable to CVE-2021-3156 (bsc#1183936)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Sudo before 1.9.5p2 contains an off-by-one error that can result in a heap-based buffer overflow, which allows privilege escalation to root via "sudoedit -s" and a command-line argument that ends with a single backslash character.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
